title: I Have Everything You Like - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Androgynous Characters   Bickering Couple   Doctors   First-time Interc**rse   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Older Love Interests   Seme Protagonist   Shota
author: Xu Xu Tu Zhi   徐徐图之   徐徐圖之
description:
Wang Jin found a beautiful drunk mixed-race boy on the side of the road. He looked pretty at night and couldn’t help bringing him home and sleeping with him. When he woke up the next day, he found out that the beauty was a minor.

This is the story of two people who met by chance, their lives turning from narcissism and selfishness to falling in love with each other’s trivialities.>
